name: Cradle (itch) (Stani_Slav)
description:
(BIGGER NOTE: Post-processing effects are currently NOT WORKING, I will try to fix this as soon as I can but in the meantime the game is still playable, it just doesn't look as good.)

(Note: This game is STILL under development and has a lot more content coming in less than a week, I reckoned I could release this for some testing)

This horror escape room game is my second project, currently available as a demo of whats to come in about a week or so.

Feedback would be much appreciated in the comments below, if you experience any bugs please state them in the comments.

WASD - move

Use mouse to look around

Cradle v1.0

- Demo released

Cradle v1.1

- Game breaking glitch fixed

- Game is now playable

Coming soon:

- More puzzles

- More sounds

- More props

- Keys

- Finishing puzzle 1

- End scene

- Upgrade the spooky set piece

- QoL changes and other miscellaneous things!
